ulxvqr.textbox_content: Workspace is a handcrafted theme created to help people build responsive, mobile-friendly and beautiful websites. Create amazing websites quickly and easily with WordPress & PageLines DMS. Drag and drop sections to change the layout around or integrate third-party sections from the marketplace to expand your site's functionality.

ujxeep.textbox_content: Workspace is a PageLines DMS Child Theme. You can have this demo up and running as your site in less than 15 minutes.

u3cwdp.textbox_content:
A Responsive WordPress Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

usimsm.textbox_content: Open up the style.less file to see all the many options available to you.  Alignment options, margin and padding options, display options, and more.

u33pb3.textbox_content: Content is a huge part of any site and Workspace comes loaded with extra typography options to help you customize the design.

uhl4lr.pagelines_herounit_tagline: Pick a color and elements throughout the site will change to reflect your choice.  Drag and drop sections into different orders, add new sections, take some away.  Build a site that looks the way you want it with Workspace & PageLines DMS.

ujxeep.textbox_content: Workspace is a PageLines DMS Child Theme. You can have this demo up and running as your site in less than 15 minutes.

item1.title: Ten Different Templates
item1.text: With ten different templates to choose from you'll have something to start every page with.  Then customize them to suit your needs.

item2.title: Great Imagery Included
item2.text: The images included with this theme are licensed for you to use in your design.  Keep them or change them to whatever you like.

item3.title: Extension Friendly
item3.text: Add in sections and plugins from the PageLines marketplace or from the PageLines Community Store and enjoy many more possibilities.

uhl4lr.pagelines_herounit_tagline: Pick a color and elements throughout the site will change to reflect your choice.  Drag and drop sections into different orders, add new sections, take some away.  Build a site that looks the way you want it with Workspace & PageLines DMS.

uige5d.textbox_content: Hundreds of developer-friendly helper classes to help you extend Workspace.

usimsm.textbox_content: Open up the style.less file to see all the many options available to you.  Alignment options, margin and padding options, display options, and more.

uq4ilk.textbox_content:
Workspace Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

Learn MoreBuy This Theme

ulxvqr.textbox_content: Workspace is a handcrafted theme created to help people build responsive, mobile-friendly and beautiful websites.

item1.title: Modern Flat Design
item1.text: Building on current design trends, Workspace leverages the flat design aesthetic to keep your site on the  cutting edge.

item2.title: Reusable Stock Images
item2.text: All images included with this theme are licensed for your use in your design.  Don't pay extra for stock images unless you want to.

item3.title: Setup In 15 Minutes
item3.text: Follow our included instructions and get going with a site that looks exactly like this demo in less than fifteen minutes.

u7x50v._highlight_subhead: Workspace was created to show off your company and its designs, products or services.

settings.pagelines_masthead_tagline: You are up and running with PageLines DMS.
settings.masthead_button_text_2: View Your Blog Page

ibox_array.title: Stay in Touch
ibox_array.text:
New to PageLines? Stay in touch by following us on Facebook and Twitter.

[like_button url="http://www.facebook.com/pagelines/" ] [twitter_button type="follow" handle="pagelines"]

ibox_array.title: Forum
ibox_array.text: Have questions? We are happy to help, just search or post on PageLines Forum.

ibox_array.title: Docs
ibox_array.text: Time to dig in. Check out the Docs for specifics on creating your dream website.

settings._highlight_subhead: The fastest & easiest way to get started.

default.name: Default
default.desc: Standard page configuration. (Content and Primary Sidebar.)

feature.name: Feature Template
feature.desc: A page template designed to quickly and concisely show off key features or points. (RevSlider, iBoxes, Flipper)

landing.name: Landing Page
landing.desc: A simple page design with highlight section and postloop (content).

u3cwdp.textbox_content:
A Responsive WordPress Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

ujxeep.textbox_content: Workspace is a PageLines DMS Child Theme. You can have this demo up and running as your site in less than 15 minutes.

item1.title: Ten Different Templates
item1.text: With ten different templates to choose from you'll have something to start every page with.  Then customize them to suit your needs.

item2.title: Great Imagery Included
item2.text: The images included with this theme are licensed for you to use in your design.  Keep them or change them to whatever you like.

item3.title: Extension Friendly
item3.text: Add in sections and plugins from the PageLines marketplace or from the PageLines Community Store and enjoy many more possibilities.

uhl4lr.pagelines_herounit_tagline: Pick a color and elements throughout the site will change to reflect your choice.  Drag and drop sections into different orders, add new sections, take some away.  Build a site that looks the way you want it with Workspace & PageLines DMS.

uige5d.textbox_content: Hundreds of developer-friendly helper classes to help you extend Workspace.

usimsm.textbox_content: Open up the style.less file to see all the many options available to you.  Alignment options, margin and padding options, display options, and more.

uq4ilk.textbox_content:
Workspace Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

Learn MoreBuy This Theme

ulxvqr.textbox_content: Workspace is a handcrafted theme created to help people build responsive, mobile-friendly and beautiful websites.

item1.title: Modern Flat Design
item1.text: Building on current design trends, Workspace leverages the flat design aesthetic to keep your site on the  cutting edge.

item2.title: Reusable Stock Images
item2.text: All images included with this theme are licensed for your use in your design.  Don't pay extra for stock images unless you want to.

item3.title: Setup In 15 Minutes
item3.text: Follow our included instructions and get going with a site that looks exactly like this demo in less than fifteen minutes.

u7x50v._highlight_subhead: Workspace was created to show off your company and its designs, products or services.

settings.pagelines_masthead_tagline: You are up and running with PageLines DMS.
settings.masthead_button_text_2: View Your Blog Page

ibox_array.title: Stay in Touch
ibox_array.text:
New to PageLines? Stay in touch by following us on Facebook and Twitter.

[like_button url="http://www.facebook.com/pagelines/" ] [twitter_button type="follow" handle="pagelines"]

ibox_array.title: Forum
ibox_array.text: Have questions? We are happy to help, just search or post on PageLines Forum.

ibox_array.title: Docs
ibox_array.text: Time to dig in. Check out the Docs for specifics on creating your dream website.

settings._highlight_subhead: The fastest & easiest way to get started.

settings.mediabox_html: <iframe  class="scribd_iframe_embed" src="//www.scribd.com/embeds/213323278/content?start_page=1&view_mode=slideshow&access_key=key-1dzmy27btqjwamjd0dye&show_recommendations=false" data-auto-height="false" data-aspect-ratio="0.772922022279349" scrolling="no" id="doc_40327" width="100%" height="1000" frameborder="0"></iframe>

default.name: Default
default.desc: Standard page configuration. (Content and Primary Sidebar.)

feature.name: Feature Template
feature.desc: A page template designed to quickly and concisely show off key features or points. (RevSlider, iBoxes, Flipper)

landing.name: Landing Page
landing.desc: A simple page design with highlight section and postloop (content).

item3.text: Follow our included instructions and get going with a site that looks exactly like this demo in less than fifteen minutes.

item1.title: Modern Flat Design
item1.text: Building on current design trends, Workspace leverages the flat design aesthetic to keep your site on the  cutting edge.

item2.title: Reusable Stock Images
item2.text: All images included with this theme are licensed for your use in your design.  Don't pay extra for stock images unless you want to.

item3.title: Setup In 15 Minutes
item3.text: Follow our included instructions and get going with a site that looks exactly like this demo in less than fifteen minutes.

draft._highlight_subhead: Workspace was created to show off your company and its designs, products or services.

live._highlight_subhead: Workspace was created to show off your company and its designs, products or services.

draft.textbox_content:
A Responsive WordPress Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

live.textbox_content:
A Responsive WordPress Theme

Designed for PageLines DMS

draft.textbox_content: Workspace is a PageLines DMS Child Theme. You can have this demo up and running as your site in less than 15 minutes.

live.textbox_content: Workspace is a PageLines DMS Child Theme. You can have this demo up and running as your site in less than 15 minutes.

item1.title: Ten Different Templates
item1.text: With ten different templates to choose from you'll have something to start every page with.  Then customize them to suit your needs.

item2.title: Great Imagery Included
item2.text: The images included with this theme are licensed for you to use in your design.  Keep them or change them to whatever you like.

item3.title: Extension Friendly
item3.text: Add in sections and plugins from the PageLines marketplace or from the PageLines Community Store and enjoy many more possibilities.

item1.title: Ten Different Templates
item1.text: With ten different templates to choose from you'll have something to start every page with.  Then customize them to suit your needs.

item2.title: Great Imagery Included
item2.text: The images included with this theme are licensed for you to use in your design.  Keep them or change them to whatever you like.

item3.title: Extension Friendly
item3.text: Add in sections and plugins from the PageLines marketplace or from the PageLines Community Store and enjoy many more possibilities.

draft.pagelines_herounit_tagline: Pick a color and elements throughout the site will change to reflect your choice.  Drag and drop sections into different orders, add new sections, take some away.  Build a site that looks the way you want it with Workspace & PageLines DMS.

live.pagelines_herounit_tagline: Pick a color and elements throughout the site will change to reflect your choice.  Drag and drop sections into different orders, add new sections, take some away.  Build a site that looks the way you want it with Workspace & PageLines DMS.

draft.textbox_content: Hundreds of developer-friendly helper classes to help you extend Workspace.

live.textbox_content: Hundreds of developer-friendly helper classes to help you extend Workspace.

draft.textbox_content: Open up the style.less file to see all the many options available to you.  Alignment options, margin and padding options, display options, and more.

live.textbox_content: Open up the style.less file to see all the many options available to you.  Alignment options, margin and padding options, display options, and more.

draft.textbox_content: Content is a huge part of any site and Workspace comes loaded with extra typography options to help you customize the design.

live.textbox_content: Content is a huge part of any site and Workspace comes loaded with extra typography options to help you customize the design.
